entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.1°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
